comment.author: 59035835@N06
comment._content: This looks like Ruislip Gardens, not South Ruislip

comment.author: 25465614@N00
comment._content: West End Road facing north. Ruislip Gardens station would be just out of shot to the right. The turning on the immediate left is for Bedford Road on which I grew up.

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: Thank you for your feedback. I have done some checking at this photo is indeed close to Ruislip Gardens. I've added a note to the description but I have left the caption as it was from the original source material.
